message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to my business.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11000. I was thinking more along the lines of $9800. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
